explanation:
code_hardening: none
resolve_compilation_errors: Replaced the java.util.logging.Logger usage with the project logger de.sanandrew.core.manpack.mod.ModCntManPack.UPD_LOG and referenced org.apache.logging.log4j.Level directly so the function compiles without the old logging framework.
exception_handling: Consolidated the two separate catch blocks for IllegalArgumentException and IllegalAccessException into a single multi-catch block and adjusted the logging call to use the new loggerâ€™s expected parameter order.
logic_customization: none
refactoring: Updated the logging call from Logger.getLogger(...).log(...) to ModCntManPack.UPD_LOG.log(...) while keeping the original Gson deserialization and @JsonRequired enforcement logic unchanged.
misc: Changed the log severity from SEVERE to WARN and removed any dependency on the legacy java.util.logging API. New custom API used: de.sanandrew.core.manpack.mod.ModCntManPack.UPD_LOG.log(org.apache.logging.log4j.Level, java.lang.Throwable, java.lang.Object).
